It is also possible to implement widgets that can be used to edit a complete nested content. This mechanism is only available for the Acacia content editor, not the older XML content editor. An example for such a widget is given in the org.opencms.dev.demo.customwidget module. You can edit the content /system/modules/org.opencms.dev.demo.customwidget/examplewidget_content.html with the Acacia editor to see such a widget.

Widgets for rendering complex types / nested contents are configured the same way as widgets for simple values in the schema of the XML content type using a layout element:
